channel.title: Adding bank pin [PI]
channel.description: Is it possible to add a bank pin option to a PI source? I really need it, because im having issues with people getting hacked, and blaming it on me for the losing their items.

Is it possible to add a bank pin option to a PI source? I really need it, because im having issues with people getting hacked, and blaming it on me for the losing their items.
